data.title: Hey Girl (This Is Our Time) Lyrics
meta_keywords: Listen to Hey Girl (This Is Our Time) Song Online

data.meta_description: Hey Girl (This Is Our Time) Lyrics by CdB. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
How long must I wait, To make you see Girl when I′m close to you, Theres no place I'd rather be The warmth of your smile warms me like the sun You erase my cloudy days, Your the only one Hey girl, this is our time I′ll never do you wrong, I'm not that type of guy Hey girl, this is our time I'll give you everything If you wear this ring, Everything will work out fine Girl when I close my eyes, your all I ever dream Your style, your looks, your Charm, your personality No I′m not like the other guys I Won′t treat you wrong Right here with me, baby you'll See thats where you belong Hey girl this is our time I′ll never do you wrong, I'm not that type of guy Hey girl, if you were mine I′ll give you everything, Everything is gonna work out fine Writer(s): Paul Francis Gray, Andrew De Silva, Bryon Glynne Jones, Raymond Medhurst, Jonathon Glynne Jones
